query:
SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.name,
  c.slug,
  c.organizerEmail,
  c.isActive,
  c.purchaseId,
  p.planType,
  p.amountPaid,
  p.status,
  p.expiresAt
FROM campaigns c
LEFT JOIN purchases p ON c.purchaseId = p.id
WHERE c.slug = 'teste-mp-demo';
